problem_text_cn: 如图所示,在Rt△BAD中,延长斜边BD到点C,使DC=\frac{1}{2}BD,连接AC,若tanB=\frac{5}{3},则tan∠CAD的值为()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, in Rt△BAD, extend the hypotenuse BD to vertex C, make DC = \frac{N_0}{N_1} BD, connect AC, if tanB = \frac{N_2}{N_3}, then the value of tan∠CAD is ()
raw_answer:
解:如图,作DE∥AC交AB于E．
在Rt△ABD中,∵tanB=\frac{AD}{AB}=\frac{5}{3}∴可以假设AD=5k,AB=3k,∴BD=√{34}k,CD=\frac{√{34}}{2}k,∵DE∥AC,∴∠DAC=∠ADE,\frac{BE}{BA}=\frac{BD}{BC}=\frac{2}{3},∴BE=2k,∴AE=k,∴tan∠CAD=tan∠ADE=\frac{AE}{AD}=\frac{k}{5k}=\frac{1}{5},
故选:D．
